summary: While driving on a remote highway, a man is torn between choosing to reunite with his estranged wife or taking up with his lovers
cast: Richard Gere|Sharon Stone|Lolita Davidovich|Martin Landau|David Selby|Jennifer Morrison|Ron White|Matthew Walker|Scott Bellis|Patricia Harras|Keegan MacIntosh|A.C. Peterson|Sandra P. Grant|Robyn Stevan|David Hurtubise|Gary Jones|Gerry McAteer|Christine Lippa|Denalda Williams|Eli Gabay|Akiko Morison|Barney McFadden|Kevin McNulty|Jay Brazeau|Betty Phillips|Mikal Dughi|Paul Anthony McLean|Mark Roberts|Marlene Worrall|Ted Deekan|Bill Finck|Carol Whiteman|Stacy Grant|Andrew Guy|Suki Kaiser|Tom Heaton|Christine Hendra|Timothy Webber|Christopher J. Tuck|Garry Chalk|Veena Sood|Tim Battle|Nancy Cawsey|Katherine McLaren|D'Arcy Lawrence|Ron Chartier|Denise Beaudry|Johnny Cuthbert|Susan Astley|Lorretta Bailey|Margaret Nelson|Stan Rodarte
title: Entre dos mujeres (Intersection)
